channel.title: Sections on JACOBI4
channel.description: Recent content in Sections on JACOBI4

item.title: About
item.description: JACOBI4 is a software suite for automating multivariate statistical data analysis inteded for researchers not versed in software development.

item.title: Grants
item.description: RFBR #19-07-00658 “Development of new methods, algorithms and pipelines for the analysis of multidimensional biological data and their software implementation” RFBR #13-07-00315 “Heterogenic data mining and combining”

item.title: Papers
item.description: Kovaleva V.Yu., Pozdnyakov A.A., Litvinov Yu.N., Efimov V.M. (2019). Estimation of the congruence between morphogenetic and molecular-genetic modules of gray voles Microtus s.l. variability along a climatic gradient. Ecological Genetics, 17(2), 21–34. doi: 10.17816/ecogen17221-34 Codons.zip Corr.zip GeoClim.zip M1.zip Vadim M. Efimov, Kirill V. Efimov, Vera Yu. Kovaleva Principal component analysis and its generalizations for any type sequence (pca-seq) // bioRxiv 535112, doi: 10.1101/535112 CytB.7z Leonid O. Klimov, Nikita I. Ershov, Vadim M.

item.title: Contacts
